amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 118-516 to ensure the Federal Reserve Bank cannot design, build, develop, establish, or issue a CBDC. Ensures the Treasury Department cannot direct the Federal Reserve Bank to do any of the above actions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Federal Reserve Bank and the Treasury Department from designing, building, developing, establishing, or issuing a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC).
